text:
Producer-san.
No, it's natural for us to do this much.

After all, the release event for the new song
is coming up soon, right?

By then, we have to perfect both
our singing and dancing!

For us, it's just one of many concerts, but for the
people who come to see us, it might be just once...
So, I don't want to have any regrets.

Yeah... that's right. Both on stage
and in the audience, with all our might...!
